name: Letter AI
headline: Empowering B2B sellers with AI-powered training, coaching, and content
description: Letter AI is the world's first generative AI powered revenue acceleration platform. Build and maintain all the collateral and training you need 10x faster with generative AI. Personalize instantly by vertical or individual customers using existing data. Ask questions in real-time to your own co-pilot with expertise in your data. Scale coaching with realistic and hyper-personalized AI roleplay. Reach out to learn more about how both large enterprise like Lenovo and Adobe and growing startups like Paro and DealerBuilt are delivering real value for their revenue teams using the Letter AI platform.

founders.name: Ali Akhtar, Founder
founders.description: Founder & CEO of Letter AI. A decade of experience in AI across various roles - as VP of ML Products at project44, ML Engineering Director at Samsara, and AI-focused consultant at McKinsey. Reach out to talk AI, enterprise SaaS, sales enablement, or anything else!

founders.name: Armen Forget, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Letter AI, software engineer, architect and leader. I started my career in military/aerospace and moved to distributed backends and ML Operations. Currently obsessed with the endless possibilities of generative AI and helping our enterprise customers leverage this technology with minimal friction.

# Revenue enablement, powered natively by AI
Letter AI helps your revenue teams win more, better, and faster. Equip your revenue teams with everything they need to close deals - from training & coaching to collateral to real-time help - in a unified platform with AI at the core.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650abce97a4c369432d4a2c8/6760b2fb4353b6235da150a3_Letter%20AI%20-%20G2.svg)

## What our customers say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650abce97a4c369432d4a2c8/6751d61c7f67e7eab88b71bf_Lenovo%20Testimonial%20Logo.png)

It has made things possible that just weren't doable without AI, helping make the team more productive and win more customers.‍The quality of content is impressive and production ready, and the AI co-pilot is a game changer. Incredible platform!

## Built for privacy
Security and privacy are top of mind for you, so they are top of mind for us. We are secured by industry-leading security frameworks and never use your data to train our models.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650abce97a4c369432d4a2c8/66c78dc99f1b26683f5a4b73_AICPA%20SOC.png)
SOC 2 Type II Certified
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650abce97a4c369432d4a2c8/66c78dc932ef4332e861c9ce_GDPR.png)
GDPR Compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650abce97a4c369432d4a2c8/66c790eb9ded592a5db256a6_Data%20Not%20Used%20for%20Training.png)
Data not used for model training
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/650abce97a4c369432d4a2c8/6664fede68276e9d35e3a6a4_Background.webp)
[Learn More](https://www.letter.ai/</data-and-security>)
# Frequently asked questions
Common questions asked about Letter AI
I‚Äôve been sold the ‚Äúunified enablement platform‚Äù story before. What‚Äôs different with Letter AI?
Letter AI distinguishes itself by combining the power of generative AI with your company‚Äôs specific documents and data to offer a truly unified revenue enablement platform. Unlike others, we deliver AI-powered content management and personalization alongside interactive training and coaching, in a single, deeply integrated platform where content informs training and vice versa. The Letter AI co-pilot brings it all together - providing a conversational entry point for your team to find everything they need. This integrated approach allows you to deliver revenue enablement in a single platform vs. multiple tools, resulting in cost savings and significantly enhancing the user experience.
How can Letter AI build enablement material in minutes?
Leveraging production-grade generative AI, Letter AI streamlines the creation of enablement materials by grabbing relevant knowledge and style from your existing documents and data and combining it with vetted external data. This AI-driven process ensures rapid delivery of rich multi-modal training and certification pathways. Combine that with rich learning insights and practical, hands-on activities evaluated in seconds with AI and you get impactful training built in minutes, not weeks or months.
How can I ensure the AI does not make things up (‚Äúhallucinate‚Äù)?
The Letter AI platform mitigates the risk of generating inaccurate or "hallucinated" content by anchoring its responses in your company's knowledge base, even declining to produce content when it cannot verify the necessary facts. This approach is underpinned by best-in-class AI engineering practices, a testament to the founding team's more than 20 years of experience in the field of artificial intelligence. On the very rare occasion that a hallucination slips through, the platform incorporates feedback loops that allow for the immediate reporting and correction of the issue, ensuring continual improvement and accuracy.
I have limited existing content. Can Letter AI still help me?
Absolutely, Letter AI is designed to work with varying levels of existing content. By utilizing AI-powered workflows, we can optimize and expand your resources, enabling the creation of interactive training, AI-powered coaching, collateral, and more. This approach has proven effective for our customers facing resource constraints, delivering significant improvements in content creation efficiency and effectiveness with minimal starting material.
How can I ensure the security of my data?
Letter AI prioritizes the security and privacy of our customers‚Äô data through comprehensive security infrastructure and responsible data practices. Our security and privacy offerings are certified by the world‚Äôs leading security standards, such SOC 2 Type II. Furthermore, we never use AI models that train on your data, ensuring there is zero chance of leakage across different customer accounts. Beyond these measures, we offer enterprise-grade security measures such as customizable data retention policies, single sign-on (SSO), multi-factor authentication (MFA), and more.For more detailed information on how Letter AI protects user privacy and data, please visit our [Privacy & Security](https://www.letter.ai/</data-and-security>) page.

## Built for privacy

# Frequently asked questions
Common questions asked about Letter AI
I‚Äôve been sold the ‚Äúunified enablement platform‚Äù story before. What‚Äôs different with Letter AI?
Letter AI distinguishes itself by combining the power of generative AI with your company‚Äôs specific documents and data to offer a truly unified revenue enablement platform. Unlike others, we deliver AI-powered content management and personalization alongside interactive training and coaching, in a single, deeply integrated platform where content informs training and vice versa. The Letter AI co-pilot brings it all together - providing a conversational entry point for your team to find everything they need. This integrated approach allows you to deliver revenue enablement in a single platform vs. multiple tools, resulting in cost savings and significantly enhancing the user experience.
How can Letter AI build enablement material in minutes?
Leveraging production-grade generative AI, Letter AI streamlines the creation of enablement materials by grabbing relevant knowledge and style from your existing documents and data and combining it with vetted external data. This AI-driven process ensures rapid delivery of rich multi-modal training and certification pathways. Combine that with rich learning insights and practical, hands-on activities evaluated in seconds with AI and you get impactful training built in minutes, not weeks or months.
How can I ensure the AI does not make things up (‚Äúhallucinate‚Äù)?
The Letter AI platform mitigates the risk of generating inaccurate or "hallucinated" content by anchoring its responses in your company's knowledge base, even declining to produce content when it cannot verify the necessary facts. This approach is underpinned by best-in-class AI engineering practices, a testament to the founding team's more than 20 years of experience in the field of artificial intelligence. On the very rare occasion that a hallucination slips through, the platform incorporates feedback loops that allow for the immediate reporting and correction of the issue, ensuring continual improvement and accuracy.
I have limited existing content. Can Letter AI still help me?
Absolutely, Letter AI is designed to work with varying levels of existing content. By utilizing AI-powered workflows, we can optimize and expand your resources, enabling the creation of interactive training, AI-powered coaching, collateral, and more. This approach has proven effective for our customers facing resource constraints, delivering significant improvements in content creation efficiency and effectiveness with minimal starting material.
How can I ensure the security of my data?
Letter AI prioritizes the security and privacy of our customers‚Äô data through comprehensive security infrastructure and responsible data practices. Our security and privacy offerings are certified by the world‚Äôs leading security standards, such SOC 2 Type II. Furthermore, we never use AI models that train on your data, ensuring there is zero chance of leakage across different customer accounts. Beyond these measures, we offer enterprise-grade security measures such as customizable data retention policies, single sign-on (SSO), multi-factor authentication (MFA), and more.For more detailed information on how Letter AI protects user privacy and data, please visit our Privacy & Security‚ü®17‚ü© page.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Letter AI**

**Website:** [letter.ai](https://www.letter.ai)

**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** Chicago, IL  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S23  
**Group Partner:** Diana Hu

---

### Mission

Letter AI aims to empower B2B sellers through an innovative platform that leverages AI for training, coaching, and content creation. They focus on speeding up the revenue acceleration process, making it both more efficient and personalized.

### What They Do

Letter AI is touted as the world's first generative AI-powered revenue acceleration platform. The platform's standout feature is its ability to speed up the creation and management of sales training materials and collateral by tenfold. 

Main Capabilities include:

- **AI-Powered Training & Coaching:** Users can create rich, interactive trainings and hyper-realistic roleplays in mere minutes. 
- **Content Creation & Management:** Leveraging AI, users can generate personalized sales assets, tailored to specific verticals or individual customers instantly.
- **Letter AI Co-Pilot:** A real-time AI assistant provides expert advice based on the company‚Äôs existing data and products.
- **Deal Pursuit:** Automates the RFP process, enhancing the buyer's experience with the industry's first AI Sales Room‚Ñ¢.

### Client Impact

Some notable clients benefiting from the Letter AI platform include industry giants like Lenovo and Adobe, alongside growing startups such as Paro and DealerBuilt. Their platform has demonstrated tangible ROI for revenue teams, helping to improve coaching and accelerate deal closures.

### What‚Äôs Next

In its brief history, Letter AI is already making waves in the sales enablement landscape, and it‚Äôs worth keeping an eye on how it continues to evolve. Whether you represent a large enterprise or an agile startup, Letter AI promises scalable solutions tailored to meet your revenue challenges. 

Interested in learning more? Check out their customer success stories for insights into how organizations are harnessing the power of AI for training and enablement. Reach out for a demo to see how Letter AI can potentially transform your sales strategies!

In the world of sales, speed and personalization are king, and Letter AI is here to take you on that journey.
